attributes.panelsJSON: [{"panelIndex":"1","gridData":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":12,"h":6},"type":"lnsXY","version":"8.12.0","attributes":{"title":"水池温度趋势","seriesType":"line","yAxis":{"id":"1","type":"avg"},"xAxis":{"id":"1","type":"date","field":"@timestamp"}},"id":"lns-xy-tank-temp"},{"panelIndex":"2","gridData":{"x":12,"y":0,"w":12,"h":6},"type":"lnsXY","version":"8.12.0","attributes":{"title":"水池水位趋势","seriesType":"line","yAxis":{"id":"1","type":"avg"},"xAxis":{"id":"1","type":"date","field":"@timestamp"}},"id":"lns-xy-tank-level"},{"panelIndex":"3","gridData":{"x":0,"y":6,"w":8,"h":6},"type":"gauge","version":"8.12.0","attributes":{"title":"冷水池温度","metric":{"id":"1","type":"avg","field":"data.params.COLD_TANK_TEMP_NTC_C.value"}},"id":"gauge-cold-temp"},{"panelIndex":"4","gridData":{"x":8,"y":6,"w":8,"h":6},"type":"gauge","version":"8.12.0","attributes":{"title":"热水池温度","metric":{"id":"1","type":"avg","field":"data.params.HOT_TANK_TEMP_NTC_C.value"}},"id":"gauge-hot-temp"},{"panelIndex":"5","gridData":{"x":16,"y":6,"w":8,"h":6},"type":"gauge","version":"8.12.0","attributes":{"title":"净水池温度","metric":{"id":"1","type":"avg","field":"data.params.PURE_TANK_TEMP_NTC_C.value"}},"id":"gauge-pure-temp"}]
